description: This PHP script handles file uploads, validates and moves uploaded files, executes configuration restore commands, and displays status messages within an HTML structure.

methods.name: move_uploaded_file
methods.description: Moves the uploaded file to a specified destination directory.

methods.name: exec
methods.description: Executes system commands such as checking configuration status and restoring configuration.

methods.name: sleep
methods.description: Pauses execution for a specified number of seconds.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a configuration string, likely a custom function specific to this environment.
